mapper.select:
select patient.id as patientID,patient.name,doctor.id as doctorID,doctor.name,patient.age,patient.gender,patient.level,beds.roomNo,patient.bedNo,patient.in_hospital_date,patient.out_hospital_date from patient left join casehistory on patient.id=casehistory.patientID left join doctor on casehistory.doctorID=doctor.id left join beds on patient.bedNo=beds.bedNo where DATE_FORMAT(patient.out_hospital_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >DATE_SUB(curdate(),INTERVAL 0 DAY)
and casehistory.doctorID=#{doctorID}

select patient.name,patient.level,patient.out_hospital_date from patient left join casehistory on patient.id = casehistory.patientID where DATE_FORMAT(patient.out_hospital_date,'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_SUB(curdate(),INTERVAL 0 DAY) and casehistory.doctorID=#{doctorID} order by out_hospital_date limit 10
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into patient (name,age, gender, deptNo, level, bedNo, in_hospital_date, out_hospital_date) values (#{name},#{age},#{gender},#{deptNo},#{level},#{bedNo},#{in_hospital_date},#{out_hospital_date})
mapper.delete: delete from patient where id in ${patientID}
